name: Renovate
description: Keep npm dependencies up-to-date with Pull Requests

RENOVATE_DEP_TYPES.description: Dependency types in package.json to renovate

RENOVATE_FORCE.description: Force creation of new PRs even if matching closed ones exist

RENOVATE_IGNORE_DEPS.description: Comma-separated list of dependency names to ignore

RENOVATE_LABELS.description: Comma-separated list of labels to add to new Pull Requests

RENOVATE_PACKAGE_FILES.description: Comma-separated list of package file paths to renovate
